name: Right of retainer
text: §560:3-903  Right of retainer.  The amount of a non-contingent indebtedness of a successor to the estate if due, or its present value if not due, shall be offset against the successor's interest; but the successor has the benefit of any defense which would be available to the successor in a direct proceeding for recovery of the debt. [L 1996, c 288, pt of §1]
